description: This table contains data on Minimum Data Set (MDS) assessments. An MDS assessment is represented by a Registry Data (RDI) record with a Registry Type (I RDI 26) value of Minimum Data Set.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: This column contains the associated patient's ID (EPT .1).

columns.name: ARD_TARGET_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the Target Date or Assessment Reference Date.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column indicates the current state of the RDI record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Associated


Populated


In Progress


Edited


Validated


Needs Review


Ready for Export


Exported


Restored


Signed


Ready to Sign


Ready to Submit


Submitted


Accepted


Rejected


Done

columns.name: MDS_REC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column indicates what type of record (A0050) the MDS represents.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Add new record


Modify existing record


Inactivate existing record

columns.name: OBRA_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The MDS record's type of OBRA assessment. (RDI 35010) - A0310A.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None of the above


Admission


Quarterly


Annual


Significant change in status


Significant correction to prior comprehensive


Significant correction to prior quarterly

columns.name: PPS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The MDS record's type of PPS Assessment (RDI 35011) - MDS A0310B.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None of the above


5-day


14-day


30-day


60-day


90-day


Readmission/return


Unscheduled assessment used for PPS


Interim Payment Assessment

columns.name: OMRA_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The MDS record's type of PPS OMRA reason for assessment (RDI 35012) - A0310C.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Start of therapy


End of therapy


Both Start and End of therapy


Change of therapy

columns.name: MDS_REQT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column indicates who requires the submission of this assessment (MDS A0410) - whether it is a federal required submission, state but not federal required submission, or neither federal nor state required submission.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Neither federal nor state required submission


State but not federal required submission


Federal required submission

columns.name: ENTRY_DISCHRG_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column indicates the kind of tracking record this MDS record serves as.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Discharge assessment-return not anticipated


Discharge assessment-return anticipated


Death in facility tracking record


None of the above


Entry tracking record

columns.name: PREV_CORR_ARD_DT
columns.description: This column indicates the ARD of the assessment to be corrected.

columns.name: PART_A_HIPPS
columns.description: This column contains the HIPPS code for Medicare Part A.

columns.name: PART_A_RUG_VER
columns.description: This column contains the version code used for MDS Z0100A.

columns.name: PART_A_SHORT_STAY_YN
columns.description:
This column indicates whether or not this is a Medicare Short Stay assessment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PART_A_NT_HIPPS
columns.description: This column contains the HIPPS code for Medicare Part A non-therapy.

columns.name: PART_A_NT_RUG_VER
columns.description: This column contains the version code used for MDS Z0150A.

columns.name: STATE_RUG_CASE_GRP
columns.description: This column contains the RUG Case Mix group for state Medicaid billing.

columns.name: STATE_RUG_VER
columns.description: This column contains the Version code used for MDS Z0200A.

columns.name: ALT_STATE_RUG_GRP
columns.description: This column contains the RUG Case Mix group for alternate state Medicaid billing on an MDS assessment.

columns.name: ALT_STATE_RUG_VER
columns.description: This column contains the version code used for MDS Z0250A.

columns.name: INSURANCE_RUG_CODE
columns.description: This column contains the RUG billing code used for a private payor.

columns.name: INSURANCE_RUG_VER
columns.description: This column contains the version code used for MDS Z0300A.

columns.name: CAA_SIG_USER_ID
columns.description: This column contains the ID of the RN coordinator who signed for the Care Area Assessment process.

columns.name: CAA_SIG_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the date of the signature in MDS V0200B1.

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_SIG_USER_ID
columns.description: This column contains the ID of the individual who signed for completing care plan decisions.

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_SIG_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the instant of the signature in MDS V0200C1.

columns.name: CORR_RN_AC_SIG_USER_ID
columns.description: This column contains the ID of the RN assessment coordinator attesting to the completion of the correction record.

columns.name: CORR_RN_AC_SIG_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the instant of the signature in MDS X1100D.

columns.name: RN_AC_COMP_SIG_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the date of the signature in MDS Z0500A.

columns.name: RN_AC_COMP_SIG_USER_ID
columns.description: This column contains the ID of the RN assessment coordinator verifying assessment completion.

columns.name: MDS_REGION_C_NAME

columns.name: PPS_DISCHRG_YN
columns.description:
Stores the value of MDS item A0310H which indicates whether the MDS is a SNF PPS Part A Discharge (End of Stay) assessment 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
